content: Performance Analysis Engineer – Core Engineering at NetApp. Graduated with Master of Science Computer Science from University of Southern California (‘24), and Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology Dharwad (‘21). Worked on systems for ML research as Project Associate - I at DREAM:Lab, Department of Computational and Data Sciences, Indian Institute of Science. Worked as Machine Learning Software Intern at DeGirum Corp. Recipient of several accolades such as J N Tata Endowment Scholarship, NSF Travel Grant, Gift Award and Travel Grant by Tata Education and Development Trust. Links: Email: ksanu2022us [at] gmail [dot] com
summary: Performance Analysis Engineer – Core Engineering at NetApp. Graduated with Master of Science Computer Science from University of Southern California (‘24), and Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering from Indian Institute of Technology Dharwad (‘21).
title: Sai Anuroop Kesanapalli
